name: Md Shahidur Rahman Nayeem
title: Software Developer
tagline: Passionate Full Stack Developer with 3+ years of experience specializing in Laravel, Node.js, and Next.js.
bio: I am a passionate Full Stack Developer with 3+ years of experience specializing in Laravel, Node.js, and Next.js. I have a strong background in building scalable SaaS platforms, digital marketplaces, and complex HR/management systems.

I am a power user of AI agents and LLM tools, leveraging them to accelerate development cycles and write optimized, bug-free code. I am committed to modern software architecture and high-impact web solutions.
